name: MTLPipelineBufferDescriptor
desc: An object that contains the mutability options for a buffer that you pass to a render or compute pipeline.

items.name: var mutability: MTLMutability
items.desc: A mutability option that determines whether you can update a buffer’s contents before related commands use the buffer.

items.name: enum MTLMutability
items.desc: The options that determine the mutability of a buffer's contents.
